seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed for reproducible training. Leave empty to use a random seed

ti_lr.title: Ti Lr
ti_lr.description: Scaling of learning rate for training textual inversion embeddings. Don't alter unless you know what you're doing.

is_lora.title: Is Lora
is_lora.description: Whether to use LoRA training. If set to False, will use Full fine tuning

lora_lr.title: Lora Lr
lora_lr.description: Scaling of learning rate for training LoRA embeddings. Don't alter unless you know what you're doing.

lora_rank.title: Lora Rank
lora_rank.description: Rank of LoRA embeddings. Don't alter unless you know what you're doing.

resolution.title: Resolution
resolution.description: Square pixel resolution which your images will be resized to for training

input_images.title: Input Images
input_images.description: A .zip or .tar file containing the image files that will be used for fine-tuning

lr_scheduler.description: Learning rate scheduler to use for training

token_string.title: Token String
token_string.description: A unique string that will be trained to refer to the concept in the input images. Can be anything, but TOK works well

caption_prefix.title: Caption Prefix
caption_prefix.description: Text which will be used as prefix during automatic captioning. Must contain the `token_string`. For example, if caption text is 'a photo of TOK', automatic captioning will expand to 'a photo of TOK under a bridge', 'a photo of TOK holding a cup', etc.

lr_warmup_steps.title: Lr Warmup Steps
lr_warmup_steps.description: Number of warmup steps for lr schedulers with warmups.

max_train_steps.title: Max Train Steps
max_train_steps.description: Number of individual training steps. Takes precedence over num_train_epochs

num_train_epochs.title: Num Train Epochs
num_train_epochs.description: Number of epochs to loop through your training dataset

unet_learning_rate.title: Unet Learning Rate
unet_learning_rate.description: Learning rate for the U-Net. We recommend this value to be somewhere between `1e-6` to `1e-5`.

checkpointing_steps.title: Checkpointing Steps
checkpointing_steps.description: Number of steps between saving checkpoints. Set to very very high number to disable checkpointing, because you don't need one.

clipseg_temperature.title: Clipseg Temperature
clipseg_temperature.description: How blurry you want the CLIPSeg mask to be. We recommend this value be something between `0.5` to `1.0`. If you want to have more sharp mask (but thus more errorful), you can decrease this value.

mask_target_prompts.title: Mask Target Prompts
mask_target_prompts.description: Prompt that describes part of the image that you will find important. For example, if you are fine-tuning your pet, `photo of a dog` will be a good prompt. Prompt-based masking is used to focus the fine-tuning process on the important/salient parts of the image

input_images_filetype.description: Filetype of the input images. Can be either `zip` or `tar`. By default its `infer`, and it will be inferred from the ext of input file.

crop_based_on_salience.title: Crop Based On Salience
crop_based_on_salience.description: If you want to crop the image to `target_size` based on the important parts of the image, set this to True. If you want to crop the image based on face detection, set this to False

use_face_detection_instead.title: Use Face Detection Instead
use_face_detection_instead.description: If you want to use face detection instead of CLIPSeg for masking. For face applications, we recommend using this option.

endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: mask

param_schema.title: Mask
param_schema.description: Input mask for inpaint mode. Black areas will be preserved, white areas will be inpainted.

parameters.description: Input mask for inpaint mode. Black areas will be preserved, white areas will be inpainted.

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.name: image

param_schema.title: Image
param_schema.description: Input image for img2img or inpaint mode

parameters.description: Input image for img2img or inpaint mode

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.default: An astronaut riding a rainbow unicorn

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.default: An astronaut riding a rainbow unicorn

parameters.name: lora_scale

param_schema.title: Lora Scale
param_schema.description: LoRA additive scale. Only applicable on trained models.

parameters.description: LoRA additive scale. Only applicable on trained models.

parameters.name: refine_steps

param_schema.title: Refine Steps
param_schema.description: For base_image_refiner, the number of steps to refine, defaults to num_inference_steps

parameters.description: For base_image_refiner, the number of steps to refine, defaults to num_inference_steps

parameters.name: apply_watermark

param_schema.title: Apply Watermark
param_schema.description: Applies a watermark to enable determining if an image is generated in downstream applications. If you have other provisions for generating or deploying images safely, you can use this to disable watermarking.

parameters.description: Applies a watermark to enable determining if an image is generated in downstream applications. If you have other provisions for generating or deploying images safely, you can use this to disable watermarking.

parameters.name: high_noise_frac

param_schema.title: High Noise Frac
param_schema.description: For expert_ensemble_refiner, the fraction of noise to use

parameters.description: For expert_ensemble_refiner, the fraction of noise to use

parameters.name: prompt_strength

param_schema.title: Prompt Strength
param_schema.description: Prompt strength when using img2img / inpaint. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of information in image

parameters.description: Prompt strength when using img2img / inpaint. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of information in image

parameters.name: replicate_weights

param_schema.title: Replicate Weights
param_schema.description: Replicate LoRA weights to use. Leave blank to use the default weights.

parameters.description: Replicate LoRA weights to use. Leave blank to use the default weights.

parameters.name: disable_safety_checker

param_schema.title: Disable Safety Checker
param_schema.description: Disable safety checker for generated images. This feature is only available through the API. See [https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety](https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety)

parameters.description: Disable safety checker for generated images. This feature is only available through the API. See [https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety](https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety)
